title: Day of Wonders
verses: Day of judg-ment, day of won-ders!
Hark! the trumpet's aw-ful sound, Loud-er than a
thousand thunders,shakes the vast cre-a-tion round!

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Emphasizes the awesome power and sound of the judgment day
